      • findReusedPasswords

        private void findReusedPasswords()
        Purpose: this method reads the database and finds duplicate passwords in the database. if no duplicates are found it displays notification to user - if duplicates are found it populates the report.

      • findExpiredPasswords

        private void findExpiredPasswords()
        Purpose: this method query's the database - and calculates all passwords that are over 30 days old.

      • setCountAndGraph

        private void setCountAndGraph(int vWeakCount,
                              int weakCount,
                              int mediumCount,
                              int strongCount,
                              int vStrongCount)
        Purpose: counts the total values of password strengths and adjust the image view graph.
        Parameters:
        vWeakCount - total number of very weak passwords
        weakCount - total number of weak passwords
        mediumCount - total number of medium passwords
        strongCount - total number of strong passwords
        vStrongCount - total number of very strong passwords

        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
